send(byte[]) - Method in class jsocket.net.TCPConnection

send(byte[]) - Method in class jsocket.net.UDPConnection
This will wrap raw bytes with DatagramPacket Uses InetAddress and port from setDefaultInetAddressAndPort(InetAddress,int)
send(byte[], InetAddress, int) - Method in class jsocket.net.UDPConnection
Wraps bytes with DatagramPacket This will send packet to specified InetAddress to specified port
send(DatagramPacket) - Method in class jsocket.net.UDPConnection
This will simply send the DatagramPacket It is assumed that the packet is ready to send
serialize(T) - Method in interface jsocket.util.ISerDe

setDefaultInetAddressAndPort(InetAddress, int) - Method in class jsocket.net.UDPConnection
Sets default InetAddress and port that packets will be sent to.
setFilter(IFilter) - Method in class jsocket.net.StringConnection
A function can be used to process string before returning it in some cases, null characters are mixed in a string A filter function can be used to remove null characters

A function can be used to process string before returning it in some cases, null characters are mixed in a string A filter function can be used to remove null characters
